title: Crowne Plaza Princeton Opens Newly Renovated Lakeside Terrace
text:
Crowne Plaza Princeton Opens Newly Renovated Lakeside Terrace September 08, 2015 14:06 ET | Source: Crowne Plaza Princeton 
PLAINSBORO, N.J., Sept. 8,   After an extensive five-month $1 million renovation, the Crowne Plaza Princeton officially debuted the Lakeside Terrace, an elegant new wedding venue, on Monday, August 24, 2015. The Lakeside Terrace features a stunning ballroom with modern d√©cor and dramatic windows that let in natural light, creating the perfect backdrop overlooking a gorgeous view of the lake. 
The Lakeside Terrace at the Crowne Plaza Princeton is sure to be the choice venue of wedding planners throughout Central New Jersey. This innovative venue, tasteful for every style, showcases cascading waterfalls, beautiful landscaping, spectacular views of an idyllic lakefront, and charming water fountains. The Lakeside Terrace offers both indoor and outdoor ceremonies and receptions, with the picturesque vision of natural beauty every bride is looking for. 
When couples book a wedding at the Lakeside Terrace, every element of their special day is coordinated by professional on-site wedding planners to ensure the most magical day comes to fruition, full of impeccable white-glove exquisite service, five-star cuisine, and acres of unique natural beauty. With various preferred local vendors, the Lakeside Terrace wedding planners will work hand in hand with their clients to create a couple's dream wedding. 
The Lakeside Terrace is also available for booking other special events, such as sweet sixteens, Bar/Bat mitzvahs, social gatherings, family occasions or business milestones, and will exceed any expectations. The culinary team will entice guests' senses with creative plates and will work closely with any event planner to fulfill a specific vision. With exceptional service, a creative culinary team and modern facility, the Lakeside Terrace is the premier event venue in the Princeton area. 
The Crowne Plaza Princeton is managed by an operating affiliate of GF Management. GF Management is an award winning Hospitality Ownership and Management Company based in Philadelphia with hotels across the country under management. 
To learn more about planning your wedding or special event at the Lakeside Terrace, please contact the Crowne Plaza Princeton's sales professionals at 609-936-6512 or info@crowneplazaprinceton.com . 
About the Crowne Plaza Princeton 
Nestled on 27 acres of beautiful wooded grounds adjacent to a serene lakefront, just minutes from Princeton University, the Crowne Plaza Princeton is a premier choice for all travelers. Situated halfway between New York and Philadelphia, this Princeton, NJ hotel is the ideal location to enjoy a relaxing and productive business retreat or meeting. The Crowne Plaza Princeton is one of the largest and most accommodating hotels in the New Jersey area, boasting more than 37,000 square feet of IACC certified meeting space. Additionally, the hotel offers many amenities, including a heated indoor pool and whirlpool where guests can relax after a productive day. Those who like to stay fit have an array of options and can enjoy a workout in the best hotel fitness facility in the market or a morning run on the scenic jogging paths. The Crowne Plaza Princeton also offers two unique dining experiences. The Forrestal Grille is a casual American dining restaurant, while the Flight Martini & Wine Lounge offers eclectic cuisine, smart cocktails and a progressive wine pairing list in a vibrant and lively atmosphere. More information can be found by visiting www.princetoncp.com . 
About GF Management 
GF Management is an award-winning, full-service hospitality ownership, management and advisory company founded in 1988 and based in Center City Philadelphia. With more than 80 hospitality assets under management, including hotels, resorts, conference centers, catering facilities, casinos and golf courses in 28 states, GF Management specializes in third-party management, asset management and advisory services for a variety of individual, private, institutional and financial clients. Many of GF's core hospitality assets within the portfolio are owned by its principals and therein provide the strength and balance of ownership and management. The Company is currently seeking to expand its portfolio of full-service ownership and management assignments through long-term contracts and joint-venture investment opportunities.
